fund_name: Carlyle AlpInvest Private Markets Secondaries Fund
notes: Secondaries-focused tender offer fund managed by Carlyle AlpInvest. Field names updated to match extraction schema.

fund_type.notes: Discretionary tender offer fund, not interval fund

share_classes.share_classes.notes: Class D minimum may be reduced to $25,000 for certain investors. distribution_fee_pct (not distribution_servicing_fee_pct) to match extraction schema.

incentive_fee.incentive_fee_pct.source_quote: Incentive Fee equal to 12.5% of the excess, if any, of (i) the net profits of the Fund for the relevant period over (ii) the then balance, if any, of the Loss Carryforward Account

incentive_fee.hurdle_rate_pct.notes: No explicit hurdle rate - uses Loss Carryforward Account mechanism instead

incentive_fee.high_water_mark.source_quote: the then balance, if any, of the Loss Carryforward Account
incentive_fee.high_water_mark.notes: Loss Carryforward/Recovery Account functions as high water mark mechanism - prevents paying incentive on recovered losses

incentive_fee.has_catch_up.notes: Uses Loss Carryforward Account instead of catch-up

incentive_fee.fee_basis.notes: Changed from total_return to net_profits to match document text and extraction output

incentive_fee.crystallization_frequency.source_quote: Incentive Fees are accrued monthly and paid quarterly

expense_cap.has_expense_cap.source_quote: the Adviser has agreed to waive its Management Fee and/or pay or absorb operating expenses of the Fund to the extent necessary to limit Total Operating Expenses

expense_cap.expense_cap_pct.source_quote: exceed 3.00% of the Fund's average daily net assets
expense_cap.expense_cap_pct.notes: Changed from cap_rate to expense_cap_pct to match extraction schema

repurchase_terms.repurchase_frequency.source_quote: offer to repurchase Shares from Shareholders on a quarterly basis

repurchase_terms.repurchase_amount_pct.source_quote: in an amount expected to be approximately 5% of the Fund's net asset value

repurchase_terms.repurchase_basis.source_quote: 5% of the Fund's net asset value
repurchase_terms.repurchase_basis.notes: Changed from net_assets to nav for consistency with evaluator synonyms

repurchase_terms.lock_up_period_years.source_quote: Shares from a Shareholder which were held for less than one year
repurchase_terms.lock_up_period_years.notes: CORRECTED: Document clearly states 1-year holding period with early repurchase fee

repurchase_terms.early_repurchase_fee_pc.source_quote: A 2.00% early repurchase fee will be charged by the Fund with respect to any repurchase of Shares from a Shareholder at any time prior to the day immediately preceding the one-year anniversary
repurchase_terms.early_repurchase_fee_pc.notes: CORRECTED: Document clearly states 2.00% early repurchase fee for shares held < 1 year

leverage_limits.uses_leverage.source_quote: The Fund may borrow money in connection with its investment activities

leverage_limits.max_leverage_pct.source_quote: asset coverage requirement of 300% of its indebtedness
leverage_limits.max_leverage_pct.notes: 33% = 300% asset coverage requirement under 1940 Act (can borrow up to 1/3 of assets)

distribution_terms.distribution_frequenc.notes: Distribution frequency not explicitly stated - at least annually for RIC compliance

distribution_terms.default_distribution_.source_quote: The Fund will operate under a dividend reinvestment plan (DRP)

allocation_targets.secondary_investments.source_quote: the Fund will invest at least 80% of its net assets (plus the amount of any borrowings for investment purposes) in Secondary Investments
